amendment.description: To provide airlines with technical assistance for coordinating reservations and ticketing with the Transportation Security Administration Watch List.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4635 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4635 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Carper. (consideration: CR S7494-7496) To provide airlines with technical assistance for coordinating reservations and ticketing with the Transportation Security Administration Watch List.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4635 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Carper.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4635 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
